txt.en:
'A [placeholder]? A [placeholder]! Please don't kill poor Párgrub! Just a simple snaga, you see, yes?

'Hmm, you want to help poor Párgrub? The sky's rain of fire made orders from Orc captain go away. Now this simple snaga tries to make a name for self. You could help! You could help!

'Orcs and the like fight for power and great things at Thorzhaf. If you fight for Párgrub, you could, err, win. Yes, win the fights! Now this is great idea!'

Párgrub glances over at his supplies.

'Hmm, you can't go into Thorzhaf dressed like that. No, that will not do! Párgrub trying to be simple scrap monger. Take this scrap armour next to you. Dress up like Orc and enter the fights at Thorzhaf. Speak to Maukatish. Maukatish get you in tournament!'

While you are not sure you totally believe Párgrub, infiltrating Thorzhaf might be worth the risk.
Maukatish can be found at Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should speak with Maukatish about signing up to participate in the pit-fighting tournament.
Thorzhaf can be found in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should enter Thorzhaf.
A conniving goblin sees opportunity in your presence and seeks an unlikely pact.

'Gar, what do you want?!'

You explain you would like to enter the fighting match in the best Orc impression you can muster.

'Gar, go away. I'm busy, you lousy snaga!'
Steal an Orc blade to look more like a fighter
Thorzhaf can be found in Talath Úrui.\n\nYou should find a suitable Orc blade to steal in Thorzhaf.

'An [placeholder]? An [placeholder]! Please don't kill poor Párgrub! Just a simple snaga, you see, yes?

'Hmm, you want to help poor Párgrub? The sky's rain of fire made orders from Orc captain go away. Now this simple snaga tries to make a name for self. You could help! You could help!

'Orcs and the like fight for power and great things at Thorzhaf. If you fight for Párgrub, you could, err, win. Yes, win the fights! Now this is great idea!'

Párgrub glances over at his supplies.

'Hmm, you can't go into Thorzhaf dressed like that. No, that will not do! Párgrub trying to be simple scrap monger. Take this scrap armour next to you. Dress up like Orc and enter the fights at Thorzhaf. Speak to Maukatish. Maukatish get you in tournament!'

While you are not sure you totally believe Párgrub, infiltrating Thorzhaf might be worth the risk.
You realize that an Orkish blade would help you look more like a fighter
